MedicalDocument.title: MedicalDocument
MedicalDocument.description: Represents a medical document stored in the vault.

id.description: Unique identifier for the medical document.

filename.description: Original filename of the uploaded document.

uploadDate.description: Date and time when the document was uploaded.

fileType.description: MIME type of the uploaded document (e.g., application/pdf, image/jpeg).

fileSize.description: Size of the uploaded document in bytes.

storageLocation.description: Location of the document stored (e.g., cloud storage URL or local path).

aiInsights.description: AI-extracted insights from the document content.

ocrContent.description: OCR extracted content from the document

definition.description: Stores medical documents in a global collection.

params.name: documentId
params.description: The unique ID of the medical document.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure uses a global collection for medical documents to simplify access for this demonstration application, removing the need for user authentication. This is not recommended for a production application handling sensitive data.
